      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color abs()
      A color whose luminance is the absolute value of the luminance of this color.
      XYZSample asSample()
      Casts the color to a wavelength sample (i.e., a wavelength with an associated value).

      A color whose components are those of this color, bounded above by the specified value.

      Gets the value of a component of this color.

      • disperse

        public Color disperse(int channel)
        Description copied from interface: Color
        A color for which all components but one are non-zero. The value of the non-zero channel is equal to the value of the corresponding channel of this color.
        Parameters:
        channel - The index of the channel to keep.
        Returns:
        A Color with only one non-zero component.
